title: Cobb Promo Marble Granite (Red/Yellow) Advertising Feather Flag 12ft - Replacement Flag Only (Without Poleset)
features: INCLUDES: One approx 12ft tall and 2.5ft wide feather flag.
MATERIAL: Heavy duty polyester. extremely durable and weather resistant, vivid colors. Single-sided printing.
BENEFITS: Perfect for outdoor advertising. Grabs attention from a distance. Increases visibility and traffic into your business.
description: This is the replacement flag that requires compatible pole set and stake to install. When fully assembled it stands approx 15ft tall. With high quality printing and vibrant colors it can grab attention of your customers from a distance and makes your business or product stand out in a crowded marketplace. This is the most effective and affordable way of drawing attention to your shop, store, business or product.
